verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-ADV: only] [V: hires] [ARG1: the very best people] . But when the best people refuse to work for him , he ends up having to hire people like Rudy Guiliani , who is the most incompetent , self - contradicting legal spokesperson I ’ve ever seen . He just admitted that all this nonsense about “ spygate ” is purely a PR stunt to change public …
